ValidationRule.description: Used to enforce data rule that either Phone or Email is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name <> "Vanguard", ISBLANK(Email), ISBLANK(Phone), ISBLANK(MobilePhone), ISBLANK(OtherPhone), ISBLANK(Fax) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter an email or a phone #. If entering phone #(s), select Primary #.
